channel.title: Compiling problem
channel.description:
Hello! when i try to compile i got this error:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Finished! Presione una tecla para continuar . . .[/code]
This is my compile.bat
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
PD: i'm using Proyect16 Source with a 317 server PD2: I have a Spanish Computer for that the error says "press any key to continue..." in spanish

item.title: Compiling problem
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

Chassy13:

It cannot find the ‘Main’ class.

oh god… i know it but how i can fix it? i don’t know what are the ‘Main’ Class

EDIT: PLEASE! help!

item.title: Compiling problem
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

Hello! when i try to compile i got this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Finished! Presione una tecla para continuar . . .

This is my compile.bat

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

PD: i’m using Proyect16 Source with a 317 server
PD2: I have a Spanish Computer for that the error says “press any key to continue…” in spanish
